item.title: These bonds are the next bearish bet to make on the AI space, says Bank of America
item.description: Stay long risk assets for now, advises Hartnett, but short hyperscaler bonds and go long zero-coupon bonds as a hedge against recession.

item.title: Anxiety over government shutdown pushes consumer sentiment down to near-record low
item.description: Consumer spending has so far held up despite soft consumer sentiment readings.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
